column6:
*** Weekly, Bi-Weekly and Monthly Available ***

This beautiful large Apt. is in a quiet & safe neighborhood attached to my house & next to the pool. It has private entrance, parking, WiFi, walk in closet, office & dinning area, bathroom, refrigerator, microwave, plates, cups & cutlery.

Ideal for professionals visiting Houston for work, a tourist & attending events. 

Why pay more for a hotel or rent a room and share bathrooms and compromise on privacy?

Look no further, get this deal.
